item.title: A guide to the Trump administration lexicon
item.description: Transparency, free speech and fraud have different meanings under Trump.

item.title: Under Trump, CIA plots bigger role in drug cartel fight
item.description: The CIA is developing plans to fulfill President Donald Trump’s campaign pledges to get tough on Mexico’s drug cartels, but critics warn of a backlash...

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to allow him to fire independent agency leader
item.description: President Donald Trump wants the justices to allow him to remove the head of the Office of Special Counsel, which investigates whistleblower reports.

item.title: Trump takes a victory lap at a rain-splattered Daytona 500
item.description: NASCAR is Trump country, White House officials have said, and attendees on Sunday warmly welcomed the president in a brief visit.

item.title: Under Trump, a U.S. that once united Europe now divides it
item.description: When Russia invaded Ukraine three years ago, U.S. leaders helped whip Europe into a staunchly unified response. Now U.S. leaders seem eager to split t...
